content: mid-project a tutorial can be found at tutorials knitpicks garter stitch flat knit every row com/cabled-cast-on one garter ridge is comprised of two row/rnds 3-needle bind off 1x1 rib flat or in the round over an even number of sts used to easily seam two row of live stitches together row/round 1 k1 p1 to end of row/round a tutorial can be found at tutorials knitpicks com/3-needle- repeat row/round 1 for pattern bind-off abbreviations approx approximately kfb knit into front and psso pass slipped stitch ssp slip slip purl these bobble bind off back of stitch over 2 stitches together bor beginning of round k-wise knit-wise pu pick up through back loop sssk slip slip slip knit cn cable needle lh left hand p-wise purl-wise these 3 stitches c 1 2 color 1 2 m marker repeat repeat together like ssk cc contrast color m1 make 1 stitch rev st st reverse stockinette st st stockinette stitch cdd centered double m1l make 1 left-leaning stitch see above decrease see stitch see above rh right hand st s stitch es above m1r make 1 right- round s round s tbl through back loop co cast on leaning stitch rs right side tfl through front loop see above cont continue skip skip decrease together mc main color decrease s decrease es sk2p slip 1 knit 2 w&t wrap & turn dpn s double pointed p purl together pass for short row needle s p2tog purl 2 stitches slipped stitch over see next pg increase s increase s together skp slip knit pass we work even p3tog purl 3 stitches slipped stitch over k knit ws wrong side together sl slip see above k2tog knit 2 stitches wyib with yarn in back together pm place marker sm slip marker wyif with yarn in front k3tog knit 3 stitches pfb purl into front and ssk slip slip knit these together back of stitch 2 stitches together yo yarn over see above cables including without a cable needle stretchy bind off tutorials for 1 over 1 cables can be found at blog knitpicks directions k2 *insert lh needle into front of 2 sts on rh com/tutorial-1-over-1-cables-without-a-cable-needle needle and knit them decrease 1 st remains on rh needle k1 tutorials for standard cables can be found at repeat from * until all sts have been bound off a tutorial can blog knitpicks com/tutorial-introduction-to-cables be found at tutorials knitpicks com/go-your-own-way-socks- toe-up-part-7-binding-off felted join to splice yarn one method for joining a new length of yarn to the end of jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off for 1x1 rib one that is already being used a tutorial can be found at directions reverse yo k1 pass yo over *yo p1 pass yo tutorials knitpicks com/felted-join and previous st over p1 reverse yo k1 pass yo and previous st over k1 repeat from * until 1 st is left then break working yarn mattress stitch and pull it through final st to complete bobble a neat invisible seaming method
